channel.title: [508]BerkyScape + Fixed Bugs and added Stuff -(All skills duel priv msg summon+)
channel.description:
Credits: 90% Berky 10% me :D It's a 508/503 server. Its attached to post. Here's what it has:
• Melee • Magic • Range • Thieving • Smithing • Mining • Woodcutting • Firemaking • Cooking • Hunting • Slayer • Agility • Prayer • Summoning • HP • Fletching • RuneCrafting • Crafting • Construction • Herblore • Farming • Skillcape Emotes • Working Auto-Retaliate • Duelling by right clicking • Half-done Trading- Opens window • Working Following • Private-Messenging • Working Ignore list • Working Equip bonus • Working Specials
What I've Changed: • Welcome to RuneScape. Login message • Removed "BerkyScape Got UPdated!" thingy • Set Starting location to lumbridge • Set no-bait message to “You have run out of Bait.” • Set Home Teleport to Lumbridge • Set Ancient Teleport (home) to Edgeville • Fixed PvP death message to say “You’ve defeated +playername+” • On death go to Lumby, instead of Varrock. • Set Friends list view from Berkly-scape World 66 to Runescape World 66 • Set LoginScreen like runeScape • Set CMBXPRATE to 25 • Fixed Woodcutting, Firemaking and runeCrafting • Added an alternative way to rc; use the talisman on the ess. All talismans worked, 100% coded by me.
Needs to be done: Add more NPCs Add Shops Fix cooking
Now some pictures:
[IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/9715/agility.png[/img] [IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/9247/herbloren.png[/img] [IMG]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/4237/loginscreeny.png[/img] [IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/1481/magic.png[/img] [IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/7646/melee.png[/img] [IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/4969/prayer.png[/img] [IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/1569/privchat.png[/img] [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7285/rangel.png[/img] [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/2798/rc2.png[/img]

99.9% berky(actually maker)0.1% to you for being a noob and leeching and taking credits for adding skills, if you agree with me post![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 26, 2009, 11:28:29 am[/size][hr][quote=“elektrey, post:3, topic:267536”]I stated that it was 90% him and i change a few things and added a new rcing way and fixed the bugs…noob.
Read before you post next time.[/quote]you didnt add rcing you copied from davidscape! god look in the mirror you have NOOB above you head in neon lights and MUG tattooed on your forhead…
